about_the_game:
OH NO! IT'S A GHOST... WITH A REVOLVER!

An artist collaboration for this crazy costume DLC pack! Kaya and Cyphr get to dress up as Oni, the bald, one-eyed deliver girl with a Tyrannosaur mace, and Ghost with a Gun respectively! Ride through Goedo with these fashionable outfits designed by Ciao (Von Krukru)!

Important Note

To use the Kaya Oni DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked Kaya Kurogami by either:
  • clearing the game's arcade mode with Jenn Husler OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • clearing the story episode "To the Source" OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.
